about_the_game:
Note: Requires More Colors DLC and The Cenozoic Era base game to play.

DLC Description: Monotone Color Pack for The Cenozoic Era

Step into a world of subtle elegance with the Monotone Color Pack for The Cenozoic Era. This DLC offers a refined, minimalist approach, transforming your prehistoric characters with a range of monochromatic shades. Perfect for those who prefer a more muted, look.

Features:

  • Sleek Monochrome Palettes: Replace the vibrant colors of your character with various shades of a single color, from soft greys to deep blacks, giving your character a stylish, uniform appearance.

  • Unique Gameplay Aesthetic: Challenge yourself with a more subdued visual experience, offering a new way to explore the Cenozoic Era.

Embrace a minimalist visual style and experience the Cenozoic world in a new, more serene way with the Monotone Color Pack.
